website_summaries.verdict: Spongebob’s Krabby Patty car is pretty speedy, sturdily made, and is easy to pilot, making this a fantastic first RC car gift.
pros: Cruises much faster than you’d expect

customer_reviews.title: Spongebob finally learned to drive and it is AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. Stupendous. So much fun! Can bump it into things and doesn't break. Can drive in reverse. Headlights that work are a nice touch. Very bright colors. 7" long, 5.5" tall, 5.5" wide. Not huge but looks larger in real life than in the picture. For the price this thing is magnificent. An absolute treasure. Can't believe I've never seen this in stores. I'm 26 and will play with this thing constantly with no shame. It is RAD.
customer_reviews.author: sami

customer_reviews.title: DOA...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this with high expectations based on overall reviews. Never worked out of the box. The light on the remote never worked, and the car was dead despite 3 different packs of batteries. When I called their customer service listed in the manual, they told me I could get s new one if I paid shipping. Promptly sent this back to amazon.
customer_reviews.author: jdpfromlexsc

customer_reviews.title: Great krabby patty car!
customer_reviews.text: This thing was a hit for our two little girls, 5 and 3, at their birthday party! It takes 4 AA batteries in the car and 2 AA in the controller. It goes a good speed without being too fast not to control. Simple steering forward, reverse, left, right. Headlights only come on in forward motion. Only reason we removed 1 star is because it does not go on carpet. We have very short carpet and it barely goes on it at all. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: The Mad Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: For Spongebob fans
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, and easy to use for my 6 year old obsessed with Spongebob. You get what you pay for, this works fine on flat, smooth surfaces and is not designed for anything else. Definitely for Spongebob fans and not RC car fans, which is fine for the price.
customer_reviews.author: M. Pritchard

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase. Great for my 5 year old!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son as a birthday present. He absolutely loves it! Holds battery life for quite awhile so that’s a plus. Design is cute and the quality is good. Remote control is simple to use, my 5 year old controls it easily. Only complaint is that it doesn’t work as great on our carpet but definitely zooms on tile!
customer_reviews.author: Ashcuad

customer_reviews.title: missing piece- probably not their fault
customer_reviews.text: Yeah, I opened it up and there was a missing battery cover. It kind of ruins the whole experience cause my little brother loves to run it into walls (cause he's 3) and it dislodges the batteries immediately. Even when I reinforced it with tape. I did however use some plastic and cut it down to size to fit the square covering, but it still doesn't keep the batteries in place. Probably wasn't their fault since there was no indication that it was opened. Maybe could've been left out of production cause the car had everything else and was strapped down properly. I'll probably buy another one just to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Cruea

customer_reviews.title: While it's very fun and colorful
customer_reviews.text: While it's very fun and colorful, the single biggest drawback of this toy is that unless you have a flat, smooth surface for it, it won't go anywhere. It's not strong enough to even move on any sort of carpet at all, the wheels won't even spin. This severely limits where it can be played with inside, which is unfortunate for something that's designed for small children. Either a motor with a tiny bit more power, or larger wheels would have solved this issue. Also - where's Patrick? He was riding shotgun in the movie.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Love it but does need updates
customer_reviews.text: Love the Spongebob Rc Patty ride! It's fun to play with and and runs super smoothly! Just a few things to be aware of before purchasing is, that you will need BATTERIES (Six AA), a screwdriver, and hardwood floors. This does not do well on carpet or rugs. Actually it won't work at all. Occasionally the signal does fade away and the patty ride does seem like it's losing battery but it's just doesn't have a strong signal to the remote.
customer_reviews.author: Yaritza

customer_reviews.title: Warning do not buy
customer_reviews.text: I'll be honest I do not recommend this product at all. When we first got it it didn't work we did mess with the wires inside of it and got it to work. it doesn't run over carpet it can't run over anything that has any bumps or lumps even if you put it on a tile or wood floor make sure there's nothing on the tile wood floor. It eats up battery. It's not worth the buy
customer_reviews.author: Wheresandy

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 2 1/2 year old grandson. He loves it! It runs into furniture constantly and is still in one piece. He’s already learned to operate the remote control. The car is fast! It turns right and left, goes forward and reverse and has working head lights. He has had so much fun playing with it. I have too. 😂
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia

customer_reviews.title: Super fun!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great gift for anyone, especially spongebob fans! It goes fast, batteries not included tho! 6 AA's required. I highly recommend this. My 3 year old loves it, and so do his siblings. He might be too young still to get the driving down, but he's trying lol Its also a great quality car, not cheaply made at all!
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: Spongebob Fans need this
customer_reviews.text: I loved this but I bought two so that my two nephews could race their cars. I didn’t know when I bought them that they work off the same frequency so they couldn’t race them. One remote works both cars so it interferes with both cars
customer_reviews.author: Saintly1

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Super cute even though it's for a six-year-old we gave it to a three year old and he is having a wonderful time playing with it easy to maneuver even fun for adults to play with
customer_reviews.author: Cupcakemom

customer_reviews.title: Sad son
customer_reviews.text: I'm so sad. I bought this September 16th. And my son is 3 and opened it yesterday for his birthday, and it doesn't work. I have never seen him so sad. We tried numerous new and different batteries, we all made sure the batteries were in right and put the batteries in the controller and it doesn't work. The remote lights up like it working but it isn't connecting with the car. I got on my order form on here to return it and it says I'm passed the return date. I'm lost. What do I do? Someone help make this right.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Great first remote control car for 5 year olds!
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 boys and we've had our share of remote control vehicles. A lot of them don't work very well. Sponge Bob has done a great job with this little Hamburger Car. The remote is easy enough to use for little hands with a simplistic up/down button on the left and a side to side button on the right. This little car does great circles, goes forward and backward, and drives smoothly for a fairly inexpensive remote control car. If you are looking for a remote control car for a 4 or 5 year old, this is a great starter. It's easy enough for them to use, plus it's just very cute!
customer_reviews.author: Amy C

customer_reviews.title: Goes super fast! Can drift too
customer_reviews.text: So fun! My son loves it. His favorite thing to do is chase the cat with it lol. It goes really fast! You can even make it drift across the floor. Doesn’t work on carpet though, so for hard floors only. Great gift!
customer_reviews.author: Tim Conner

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Nice Crappy Patty Ride!
customer_reviews.text: Super simple set up for my 2 year old. It drives nice on carpet or hardwood floors. It’s pretty quick also. My little one can control it on his own. Pretty neat little remote control car!
customer_reviews.author: Franklin

customer_reviews.title: adorable but...
customer_reviews.text: my grandson loves this adorable spongebob car. the only problem I have with it is not being able to drive on carpet. it just doesn't have enough power. we even tried high dollar batteries thinking that might be the problem but it still didn't help. I think the car just sits too low. we had wrapping paper laying on the carpet and my husband drove the car right over the paper with no problem so its definitely the carpet
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Perry

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these, one for each grandson (brothers). They don’t operate together very well. The controller will jump between cars and operate the other...
customer_reviews.author: AmzShopper

customer_reviews.title: NKOK Remote Control Krabby Patty Vehicle with Spongebob
customer_reviews.text: Got the product as a gift and so far it has been well received, the birthday boys was happy I am happy.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Givens

customer_reviews.title: Great quality remote control car!
customer_reviews.text: Made our 5 year old soooo happy! To be honest, our 2 year old wanted to use it just as much. I say you can get this for your 2-6 year old or whoever likes Sponge Bob. Works well and uses just a few AA batteries and not any odd sizes of batteries. It takes a few minutes to learn how to steer it for a kid, but they figured it out and kept bumping it into things and it seems to be holding up very well. Does well on our low pile carpet but can go super fast on hardwoods.
customer_reviews.author: Laurel

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old loves this spongebob car. It’s easy enough for her to operate & she has a lot of fun with it. I had to jostle the antenna on the remote around to start to get it to work initially but worked well after that.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqui Gambacorta

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!
customer_reviews.text: My two year old love this. It is easy to drive and he has so much fun with it. I would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Walters

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: the car itself is good quality but the remote needs some work. Overall though it is a great toy and my child who is obsessed with spongebob loves it.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Fun car for everyone, and fast.
customer_reviews.text: So much fun for kids. Wish they had another version to race with. This thing is faster than expected. Remote control is a bit flimsy at the battery compartments which are setup one on each handle.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby May

customer_reviews.title: love the size
customer_reviews.text: Its ok, My 8 year old son stop playing with it, maybe they need to add more features ,like the sound of spongebob voice but it's probably for younger children anyway. I like the size.
customer_reviews.author: Sheenababy

customer_reviews.title: Very cute!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 9 year old niece. She absolutely loves it! It's pretty quick and durable as she has ran into every wall in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: SpongeBob Express
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this toy :-) it is colorful, and the fact the headlights work really delighted my grandson. The only problem I have with this toy is it isn't powerful enough to run on carpeting and unfortunately his home is fully carpeted. However, it's crazy fun to operate it in the driveway. I would and have suggested it to many people, and anyone who's seen it wants one. My reply ... AMAZON.Com
customer_reviews.author: R. Sandvig

customer_reviews.title: Not too shabby of a remote controlled car
customer_reviews.text: Son enjoyed it for a few minutes. We got it for his 4th birthday, but he seems more interested in pushing the car around manually. Our oldest will use the remote to play with it. It's pretty quick on our carpet and the batteries are still going ( I put rechargeable batteries in both the car and remote ).
customer_reviews.author: CJCR

customer_reviews.title: Smooth operation!
customer_reviews.text: This is well made. Easily maneuvered by young children. Quieter than other RC's I have purchased as well.
customer_reviews.author: julia from Green Lake Wi.

customer_reviews.title: Cute but don't expect to change the batteries
customer_reviews.text: These screws are so cheap it's impossible to unscrew them without stripping the screws or breaking the plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: This item was given as a gift.
customer_reviews.text: I gave these to my niece's 6-year old daughter as a recommended present.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M. Gennaro

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing Gift!
customer_reviews.text: Well a Birthday present disappointment the remote worked not the car itself my Granddaughter was so disappointed Didn’t keep the box got thrown away in all the hectic ness she brought it home and didn’t work not happy at all!
customer_reviews.author: KEVIN KELLY SR

customer_reviews.title: Very durable!
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for my daughter! She loves spongebob and this remote control car is very durable after many bumping and flipping the car over lol she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Jennybee5427

customer_reviews.title: Fast!
customer_reviews.text: Large and faster than expected. My 3 year old grandson loves it!
customer_reviews.author: D from MN

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this product for my nephew and am so pleased! Everything about this toy is wonderful. The controls are easy to operate, batteries were not hard to install, and it is very durable. I didn't know when I purchased that the headlights work which is also very neat! Anyone who is looking for spo gebib toys knows that it is not easy to find things but this is def a keeper!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Hart

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my nephew. Works well and worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: works great!
customer_reviews.text: This remote control car has the best battery life by far compared to my son's other remote control cars. If your child likes remote control cars I highly recommend this one over the real to life remote control cars that you have to replace the battery everyday.The lights really work. It moves forward, backward and turns very well. We are very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Seagle-Amaya

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted 3 uses
customer_reviews.text: Our son used it 3 times, by the 3rd time it hardly moved. We changed the batteries 2 times and it still moved at a snail's pace. He was so disappointed because it worked great in the beginning.
customer_reviews.author: joel

customer_reviews.title: Nice toy.
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old loves this. It’s really fast and really well made.
customer_reviews.author: Yazmin

customer_reviews.title: Love This!
customer_reviews.text: My two year old daughter loves this remote control krabby patty! It’s super easy for her to use the controller and make it drive around and the headlights work great! I would highly recommend definitely one of my best purchase yet
customer_reviews.author: Victoriahope

customer_reviews.title: Gift was well liked by 6 year old girl
customer_reviews.text: Gave this Krabby Paddy car to my 6 yo great-niece. She loves it. She is a huge fan of the show Sponge Bob Square Pants.
customer_reviews.author: Carole Sue

customer_reviews.title: Spongebob can finally drive!
customer_reviews.text: This bad boy is fast! My child loves spongebob and this is incredibly fun! Very easy to get the hang of the control. It's about as cute as can be, a very nice big size. Any spongebob fan will think this is awesome. It can take a beating too, this has been rammed into walls and table legs at high speed, and keeps on truckin!
customer_reviews.author: al1

customer_reviews.title: Fun to play with
customer_reviews.text: So much fun, even my husband and I played with it . Its surprisingly very fast but easy enough for a 3 year old to use. Nicely built, we have bumped into everything you can imagine and not even a scratch on it.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Like others have stated it doesn't work on carpet. Have had it for over a month and it's still going strong!
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: cute. note that wheels don't have tread.
customer_reviews.text: so cute! has some trouble when driving onto a rug or floor transitions. it's because the wheels are smooth without any tread. works without any issue on smooth flooring like wood laminate or tile. otherwise, so cute. the headlights turn on when accelerating.
customer_reviews.author: G Gris

customer_reviews.title: My son loves this bc he loves spongebob.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this bc he loves spongebob. Only problem is it doesn't want to go on carpet so he has to play with it in the kitchen
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: SUPER FAST AND VERY CUTE
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a birthday present and let me just say, it was by far the favorite gift! This thing is super cute, durable and really fast. The perfect gift!
customer_reviews.author: M. Frederick

customer_reviews.title: she loved it and its so fun
customer_reviews.text: I gifted this to a friend and it was honestly the highlight of my day, she loved it and its so fun! the car drives great, its very fast and easy to maneuver. She will be taking it with her to college. We're adults but i'm 90000000% sure this toy was made for the enjoyment of college age students.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and nice quality toy.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome toy! Very fast and bright headlights. Much better than I expected it to be!
customer_reviews.author: April Oneal

customer_reviews.title: This looks cool, and it is
customer_reviews.text: This looks cool, and it is, kind of. It will only go on our hardwood. It is not very easy for our kids to navigate. It's a nice size and the details are nice. Just wish it was a little more. Glad I didn't pay full price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small and cute!
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this this toy for my nephews birthday and he absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: cony guevara

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I love it, the box it comes in is so cute. And it’s heavy duty as well
customer_reviews.author: Shaylea

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: My great niece loves it. Its a perfect gift and it well made.
customer_reviews.author: JessJLloyd

customer_reviews.title: Delivered Broken
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this a zero I would. The toy was delivered broken, and my nephew was extremely disappointed (was for his birthday). We tried multiple sets of batteries because at first we thought that might’ve been the issue however, after multiple tries and batteries later, we came to realize the device was just faulty.
customer_reviews.author: Kati

customer_reviews.title: Big time fun
customer_reviews.text: Oh yeah, this one is awesome for him, for her, for us!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon O.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Omg best gift ever I love this toy so easy for my 3 year old
customer_reviews.author: Evalynn

customer_reviews.title: Accurate description
customer_reviews.text: Had to order a second one for our older daughter! However, the wheels disconnected on the first one
customer_reviews.author: Danielle n.

customer_reviews.title: My nephew loves sponge bob and remote control cars! ...
customer_reviews.text: My nephew loves sponge bob and remote control cars! Thanks for combining the two. He is getting this for christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Keza

customer_reviews.title: Great toy.
customer_reviews.text: My Autistic son received this for his fifth birthday, and he loves it. It is very was to use and goes far with ease. He loves that it is large in size and the head lights go on when he speeds forward. This is highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: psykadelic

customer_reviews.title: love this bad boy
customer_reviews.text: love this bad boy. It is not strong though. It gets caught on carpet because it does not have enough traction to pull itself over the carpet, but on smooth surfaces, watch out. The kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: Alvaro

customer_reviews.title: We love it
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter's birthday. She and my husband love it!
customer_reviews.author: B lorane Woodall

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old nephew loves the toy! Came well packaged and in perfect condition (it was gift).. I would recommend this toy...
customer_reviews.author: Mara Bicca

customer_reviews.title: Cute for kids, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: That said, be careful for too young of kids inside, this thing moves faster than you would think.
customer_reviews.author: CaptainCamaro

customer_reviews.title: Great but
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this toy! He is 6 years old
customer_reviews.author: HonestReviews

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: My nephew absolutely loved this gift! I’d recommend it for sure
customer_reviews.author: beatriz pereira

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for my son and one for my nephew. It’s a real fun toy and great for small kids.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: Great product comes exactly as described as. I wish spongebob could come out or the controller was made with better plastic but great for price
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my niece's birthday. She nearly lost her mind when she saw it. Had to fiddle with it a bit so it would turn both directions, but otherwise it has been great. Bigger than I thought, but that was a plus. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Battery sucker
customer_reviews.text: Car is fun all for about 20 min ....batteries die to fast ...I went through 100 batteries in two days on this toy
customer_reviews.author: amber

customer_reviews.title: Worst remote control car!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible I wish I had done a refund before time was up! Barely moves. No surface is good enough total disappointment
customer_reviews.author: LeyeaMarie

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: Little dude loved it. Great gifts for the little toddlers. I got this for my nephew's 3rd birthday and he was racing this car around the house.
customer_reviews.author: The Wise Lady

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it
customer_reviews.text: I have a big sponge bob fan lol my sons exact words when opening it on Christmas “I always wanted this on”. Quick to set up and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Not just for kids, for that kid in all of us
customer_reviews.text: This is Hysterical Bought as a Gag gift, soon the kids have taken it over easy to use and lots of fun, who does not love sponge bob driving a crabby patty. When item arrived it appeared bigger than what it looked in picture.
customer_reviews.author: Michele H

customer_reviews.title: Classic Spongebob
customer_reviews.text: Oh my god! THIS! This is so cute and funny! I LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: MacGirl

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a birthday gift for my 1 year old ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a birthday gift for my 1 year old nephew. He loves it! But I don't know who loves it more, him or his parents.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: This saw a lot more use than I ever expected. No idea where it is now, but until we got new light sabers it was the nightly toy for my son while we walk the dog.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fun toy but lacks power. Runs well on hard wood floors but terrible on carpet.

customer_reviews.title: R C Spongebob Krappy patty
customer_reviews.text: This a.big R C vehicle my grandson.who.is.five Soon.to.be six the first of Dec.so detailed and realistic awesome present.thanks for.great Price and delivery IT IS A SPONGEBOB KRAPPY P atty

customer_reviews.title: Provided 25 minutes of fun before dying.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was so excited to get this toy. It was awesome for about 20 minutes and stopped working. I changed the batteries and it ran for another 5 minutes and then totally quit. Sending back tomorrow for a refund!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was the perfect birthday gift for my little boy, he loved it!! THANKS.♡ Edna.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Xmas gift
customer_reviews.text: Was a good Xmas gift just wish it can move alil faster on carpet
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great toy
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old grandson loves this toy. It even has headlights. It's easy enough even for him to steer it around with the remote. It's a good size too! Overall a cool toy for a good price.
customer_reviews.author: groomer74

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super cute toy. My 2 year old grandson loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Dee777

customer_reviews.title: Glad I Got This!
customer_reviews.text: This toy is so cool! I bought it for my younger brother and he likes it a lot. Just opened it today so hopefully it keeps working as well as it does now. Only downside to it is that it's slow on carpet and needs a little push to get it going if it's on carpeted floors but I pretty much expected that. I'm glad I got this little patty.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Ellis

customer_reviews.title: This thing is super fast so watch your feet
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old adores this toy! This thing is super fast so watch your feet! The only con is that it goes through batteries like crazy but then again my little girl plays with this toy multiple times per day.
customer_reviews.author: PKTeacherMom

customer_reviews.title: Fun Sponge Bob Hamburger
customer_reviews.text: Really great remote controlled hamburger with Sponge Bob. Two boys are having a fun time with this car. Also purchased Patrick in dune buggy. Both cars lots of fun. Fast delivery and great product.
customer_reviews.author: nana4

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and fun remote control car
customer_reviews.text: The remote control car was a good buy for the price. Very sturdy and runs well.

customer_reviews.title: disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Was a Christmas gift and only worked on Christmas Day. Have replaced batteries and it does not work anymore no matter what. Very disappointing.

customer_reviews.title: A little slow . But for young kids it's perfect
customer_reviews.text: A little slow . But for young kids it's perfect

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for flat surfaces not strong enough for carpet but really cute

customer_reviews.text: My son loved his birthday gift! This is easy to work and so far not a major battery drainer...seems to be well made...great purchase!

customer_reviews.title: it is as its descrubed

customer_reviews.text: My son loves it and plays very rough. Everything is still working.

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: My 1 year old loves this... it’s fast and fun

customer_reviews.title: He was beyond excited about this toy and later said it was his favorite gift. It works great & looks like the ...
customer_reviews.text: My son, 8yo, loves cars and remote control anything. He was beyond excited about this toy and later said it was his favorite gift. It works great & looks like the picture!!!

customer_reviews.text: This quit working after 3 weeks and now too late to return. Not worth $30!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

product_meta.title: NKOK Remote Control Krabby Patty Vehicle with Spongebob
product_meta.description:
Full function RC vehicle; features working headlights; officially licensed product; requires 6 AA batteries

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
This full function RC vehicle features SpongeBob in a Krabby patty Vehicle. Vehicle also features working headlights and is officially licensed product.
